Articles.Content:
I think it's time squad. In .23 or .24, it would be great to have new SRB and Liquid Engine sounds to a realistic scale. If any of you have listened to the beautiful sound of an SRB? If not, look it up. They sound amazing.

This would be great to have Squad!
I believe there's a mod for this, it's called http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55227-Kerbal-Sound-Overhaul-Project Kerbal Sound Overhaul Project.
